title: Miracle Cures and More
description:
What can we do as individuals to help when there are so many important causes out there? Plus, Jillian debunks the Epsom Salt cure-all myth, and answers emails about rest days, working out when you’re sleep deprived, supplements and more!


Giving away a free bag of Right Rice to the first 1000 people at RightRice.com/Jillian

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

THIRDLOVE.com/jillian for 15% off your first purchase
